messages.welcome: Welcome to Vibe Music! Want a quick 1-minute tour to see how to build your library?
messages.fab: This is where the magic starts. Click here to add your first album!
messages.search: We'll search for 'Daft Punk' albums. Click next and I'll type it for you!
messages.add: Found some great albums! Click next and I'll add the first one for you.
messages.manual: No results? No problem. You can always add an album manually with your own details.
messages.albumClick: Your album is added! Click next and I'll take you inside.
messages.trackClick: Select a track to add its audio source.
messages.songUrl: Let's make this playable. I'll add a demo MP3 link for you.
messages.play: All set! Click the play button to hear the vibe.
messages.premium: Enjoying the vibe? Upgrade to VibeSync Pro to handle specific versions and backups. Check out the full tutorial below!
messages.end: You're all set! Explore freely or check Settings to run this tour again.
